price: 4. To bakisa yango mpe tanga kurani malembe mpe polele!
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
